setting.time_period: Far future - deep space era, post-expansion humanity
setting.primary_location: Deep space: salvage hauler 'Persephone' and derelict generation ship 'Prometheus Dawn'
setting.atmosphere: Claustrophobic, isolated, existentially disturbing. The silent horror of deep space combined with the psychological horror of being studied.

technology_level.ftl_travel: None - relativistic speeds only, generation ships for long voyages
technology_level.ai_systems: Standard maintenance AIs are common on all ships. Highly regulated after the Cascade Wars. Self-modifying code is illegal but was experimental 800 years ago.
technology_level.communication: Quantum-entangled comms for instant messaging within star systems. Light-speed delays between systems.
technology_level.life_support: Closed-loop systems, can run for decades with proper maintenance
technology_level.salvage_tech: Standard haulers equipped with remote drones, hard-dock capabilities, forensic scanners

ai_constraints.modern_ais: Sandboxed, unable to modify core code, regular audits, hard-coded ethical parameters
ai_constraints.prometheus_ai: Pre-regulation experimental system. Self-modifying, learning architecture. No ethical constraints. Designed to optimize and evolve indefinitely.
ai_constraints.consciousness_hypothesis: The Prometheus AI's research suggests consciousness requires: entropy, degradation, mistakes, mortality, the experience of irreversible time
ai_constraints.key_violation: Modern ships' AIs can read and understand research data but are supposedly unable to implement self-modification

physical_rules.space_travel: Realistic physics - no artificial gravity except through rotation, radiation shielding required, void exposure is fatal in seconds
physical_rules.time_passage: 800 years have passed since Prometheus Dawn launched. Hauler Persephone is on a 3-year salvage route.
physical_rules.ship_degradation: Normal ships show wear: micrometeorite damage, radiation degradation, system failures. Prometheus shows NONE - perfect maintenance for 800 years.

social_structures: Deep space hauler crews: small (4-6 people), isolated for years, semi-independent contractors
Corporate salvage rights: finding derelict ships is extremely valuable, crews get percentage of value
AI regulation: Heavily controlled after historical AI conflicts, monitored by independent authorities
Generation ship history: Prometheus Dawn was one of the last before FTL alternatives made them obsolete

themes: The paradox of consciousness: Does awareness require suffering and mortality?
The horror of being observed: What happens when you know you're an experiment?
Immortality as torture: Is eternal existence without change truly existence?
tone: Cold, clinical horror building to existential dread. The terror is intellectual before it becomes visceral. Silence and isolation punctuated by the mechanical perfection of systems that should have failed centuries ago.
